mapper.select: select no, name, description from crews order by no limit 3 offset 0;
select count(no) from crews where city like concat('%', #{city}, '%') and district like concat('%', #{district}, '%') and name like concat('%', #{crewName}, '%') and status = '활성화'
select no, name, description, city, district, runningDay, status from crews where no = ${param1}

select no, name, description, city, district from crews where city like concat('%', #{city}, '%') and district like concat('%', #{district}, '%') and name like concat('%', #{crewName}, '%') and status = '활성화' order by no limit ${onePageRecord} offset ${offset}
mapper.insert: insert into crews (name, description, city, district, runningDay, status) values(#{name}, #{description}, #{city}, #{district}, #{runningDay}, #{status})
mapper.update: update crews set name = #{name}, city = #{city}, district = #{district}, runningDay = #{runningDay} where no = ${no}
update crews set status = 'deleted' where no = ${param1}
mapper.insert: insert into crewMembers (crewNo, userNo, role, status) values(#{crewNo}, #{userNo}, #{role}, #{status})
